column4: Is there a way to send the "standby" signal to the monitor? I leave my laptop on, but would like to turn the screen off without waiting for it to do it itself.
most laptops have a key with a function to do that...

I don't think I have one. I have one to send the whole computer into standby, and one to switch output to the VGA, and even just found one that ejects my cd drive (freakin sweet), but none that turn off the monitor. Do you know of any applications that do it?
